thread.title_full: Best Resorts in Maldives for Honeymoon (Royal Rahi Travels)

title: Best Resorts in Maldives for Honeymoon (Royal Rahi Travels)
text: By Royal Rahi Travels Oct 19, 2015 Maldives is one of the most romantic honeymoon destinations. One can enjoy the view of beaches covered with sparkling white sand and palm trees lined up across the shores.There are many Best Resorts in Maldives for Honeymoon which let the love birds to rekindle the spark and fall in love.The below mentioned list of Luxury Resorts in Maldives are most rated by visitors. The significant of these resorts are, they come with "do not disturb" symbol and let you to enjoy every moment of your honeymoon holidays to the fullest.Check Out Best Resorts in Maldives for Honeymoon1. Taj Exotica Resort and SpaTaj Exotica Resort and Spa is one of the idyllic resorts in Maldives for honeymoon, surrounded with tropical flora and clear blue water. It is an exclusive and private resort island. The well furnished lagoons and deluxe beach villas offers the most romantic days that you once had dream. It has a lot to offer including Indian spa, gourmet cuisines, cocktails during sunset and candle-light dinner with your love under the shades of star.2. Cocoa IslandCocoa Island is enriched with extraordinary beauty that combines the perfect beaches, beautiful rooms, wonderful food and superb staff. It is one of the unique resorts especially designed for honeymooners. You can enjoy the outdoor shower with your beloved to make your honeymoon romance full.3. Baros MaldivesBaros Maldives resort offers luxurious accommodation with home entertainment systems and private gardens. Newly weds can enjoy in the overwater infinity pool.4. Soneva Gili ResortSoneva Gili Resort offer numbers of over-water villas. Every villa has been designed and built perfectly having its own private water garden and sun decks. Couples can enjoy the dine on the villa deck under moonlight.5. Mirihi Island ResortMirihi Island resort is one of the most affordable on the best luxury resorts in the Maldives. The resort is blessed with white beaches, turquoise blue waters and one of the most amazing house-reefs. About the Author
